content:
easy beginner project for regular crocheter looking to do threadwork for the first time from the 1948 woman s day crochet annual
**materials ** * six cord mercerized crochet cotton size 30 1 small ball of white or ecru * steel crochet hook no 10 alternate link for the archived pattern 1 1 http //web archive org/web/20080115065219/www angelfire com/folk/celtwich/shellstitch html
